channel.title: [HELP]#### X - LOGGING / XLOGGERS ## Lets get it out of our community! %%%%%%%%
channel.description:
[center]Okay first I will start with what X-Logging is,
[u][b]What is xlogging?X-Logging [/b] [/u] Xlogging is known throughout rs2 Private servers as a way to cheat combat, to get away from a situation that normally it would not be possible to get out of. [u][b] How is Xlogging done?[/b][/u] Xlogging is done by mearly pretty the xbutton on your gameclient which forces your character to disconnect, It can [u]not [/u] be done on [b]Runescape[/b] and some Big servers but is becoming a massive problem in Echonomy based servers. Even one of the biggest 317 Private servers of all time[b] [s]Battlescape[/s] [/b] ( In my opinion) had a problem with it.
[u][b]Why must it be stopped[/b][/u] Simply because players will be able to just Go pking without risk, then if they are in danger of death, will just xlogout.
[u][b]What is this topic about then?[/b][/u]
Im looking for people who know about this problem, perhaps have helped fix this problem before, to help rid this community of this terrible glitch. If done possible, one of us will release a credited tutorial to make sure [b]all Private servers [/b] are protected from Xlogging in the near future.
[u][b] Leave comments and help me and the rest of the community![/b][/u][/center]

item.title: [HELP]#### X - LOGGING / XLOGGERS ## Lets get it out of our community! %%%%%%%%
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

“X-logging” is an easy fix.

Before you close the socket, check if they’re in combat. :O???

Read full topic

battlescape was a great server, but its hard to single out 1 server as the best. P.S. I support this thread, wish I could help

item.title: [HELP]#### X - LOGGING / XLOGGERS ## Lets get it out of our community! %%%%%%%%
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“faded vision, post:11, topic:273138”][quote author=Newty link=topic=360487.msg2753891#msg2753891 date=1240082305]

[quote author=faded vision link=topic=360487.msg2752789#msg2752789 date=1240009563]

LOL bs is not the best pirvate server ever made btw x logging is not a big deal…I already fixed on my source so it isn’t that hard…You just have to keep player logged when he’s in combat when he destruct he’s client.

Aintaro

Your signature means i have no respect for you whatsoever.

Faded, Paladino76 is not some god or hero you should be looking up to.

WHAT?

But seriously faded, how can you possibly call BS the best 317 ever when you haven’t been around 317’s long enough to know?
[/quote]I played runescape 317 , that long enough for you?

That doesn’t mean you have been around Private servers since RS 317.
[/quote]okay i take it back. Your right i have not played every single 317 server ever therefore i cannot possibly say one is the best.[/quote]

Nope, however you are entitled to your opinion, ;), and yes I agree, Battlescape was a good server, just not the best. That is my opinion.

On topic: Good luck with this.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]#### X - LOGGING / XLOGGERS ## Lets get it out of our community! %%%%%%%%
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Faded, Paladino76 is not some god or hero you should be looking up to.

Simply finish all actions that need to be finished before removing the player from the server (so, check if anything has yet to finish when the socket is terminated).

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP]#### X - LOGGING / XLOGGERS ## Lets get it out of our community! %%%%%%%%

item.title: [HELP]#### X - LOGGING / XLOGGERS ## Lets get it out of our community! %%%%%%%%

item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

[quote=“twins, post:4, topic:273138”]This shouldn’t be a tut… its way to simple.[/quote]If its so simple maybe you could take a small moment out of your time to help this community?

If its so simple why did paladino76 not have it in the greatest 317 of all time?

If its so simple WHY are so many other servers suffering from it

If its so simple am I an idiot for not being able to fix it

Read full topic
